programme.title: Land Of the Blind
programme.desc: A soldier recounts his relationship with a famous political prisoner attempting to overthrow their countrys authoritarian government.

programme.title: Remembrance
programme.desc: Remembrance depicts a remarkable love story that blossomed amidst the terror of a German concentration camp in 1944 Poland. This impossible passion fuels the courage of a Polish prisoner who manages to rescue his Jewish girlfriend. Against all odds, they escape the camp and survive a treacherous journey to freedom. But during the chaos of the end of the war, they are forcibly separated and each is convinced that the other has died. More than thirty years later in New York, the happily married 52-year-old woman accidentally finds out that her former Polish lover is still alive. And she has to see him again.

programme.title: Musketeers Forever
programme.desc: A group of ex-secret agents opens a Jazz Club in Las Vegas. When they discover that a local Indian reservation is being threatened by a greedy and powerful gangster, they act. All for one, and one for all!

programme.title: The Phantom Father
programme.desc: The Phantom Father tells a story of an American professor Robert Traum, who takes a sabbatical from his teaching job to trace his roots in Romania. Traum soon discovers that he comes from a wealthy family involved in organized crime. He manages to reestablish contact with the sole remaining link to his otherwise deceased family—Sami. Rocco Castoro, the editor-in-chief of VICE magazine called the movie the best Romanian movie hes ever seen.

programme.title: No Limit Kids
programme.desc: Ashton, Celeste, and Becca are three unlikely middle school outcasts who form a club in an abandoned theater. There, they meet Charlie (Bill Cobbs, Night at the Museum), a homeless man who shares their passion for musical theater. When the theater is scheduled to be torn down, the teenagers set out to save the landmark with a modern-day performance of Shakespeares Much Ado About Nothing. Along the way, the group learns to treat others with respect and stand up for their beliefs. This Dove-approved film also features Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Lee Meriwether.

programme.title: Baba
programme.desc: An weird but witty old woman is forced to deal with an ambiguous future after her country, family and the entire system of values are ruined. She is trying to solve her existential problems catching d trying to sell a rewarded war criminal as he was a rabbit in a wood. The only thing she did not know if he is really him.

programme.title: Uncle Nino
programme.desc: A distant, slightly dysfunctional family is brought closer together when the fathers long-estranged Uncle Nino comes from Italy to Chicago for a surprise visit.

programme.title: Scout Camp
programme.desc: The Fire Dragon patrol, with their ever-supportive scoutmaster, is headed to Camp Rakhouta for what should be the best week of their lives. But when the "Team Spirit Stick" of the camp goes missing, the entire tradition of the camp is threatened.

programme.title: I Could Never Be Your Woman
programme.desc: A mother falls for a younger man while her daughter falls in love for the first time. Mother Nature messes with their fates.

programme.title: Almost Friends
programme.desc: Charlie, a culinary genius, has lost the motivation. He doesnt know what to with his life anymore, but he knows one thing - get close to Amber. In comparison to her boyfriend, he seems to be totally unattractive, but Charlies closest friend convinces him that where theres a will theres a way.

programme.title: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: Two cop partners, who are also best friends attend a domestic disturbance, only for one to accidentaly critically wound the other. The rest of the police force are suspicious that there may have been no accident.

programme.title: When Do We Eat?
programme.desc: A familys Passover gets screwy after the patriarch unknowingly ingests a hit of Ecstasy.

programme.title: My Son, My Son, What Have Ye Done
programme.desc: Inspired by a true crime, a man begins to experience mystifying events that lead him to slay his mother with a sword.

programme.title: Black Cop
programme.desc: Follow the contradictory and challenging story of an African Canadian cop. He has been attacked by his fellow officers and becomes the victim of racial profiling. The policeman is struggling between duty and moral obligation, and is pushed over the edge. He decides to take revenge on his community.

programme.title: Field of Lost Shoes
programme.desc: Based on a true story of the American Civil War, culminating at the Battle of New Market, May 1864. A group of teenage cadets sheltered from war at the Virginia Military Institute must confront the horrors of an adult world when they are called upon to defend the Shenandoah Valley. Leaving behind their youth, these cadets must decide what they are fighting for.

programme.title: The Adventure Scouts
programme.desc: A coming of age movie about a group of boys and girls called "adventure scouts" who return from a camping trip to discover their small town is being held captive by a gang of motorcycle-riding knuckleheads. Using only their scouting knowledge and camping equipment, the kids take down the gang members one by one, reunite with family members, and restore the communitys sense of pride.

programme.title: Suits on the Loose
programme.desc: Two rebellious teens, on the run from a desert survival camp, steal the car of two naive Mormon missionaries. They end up in New Harmony, the town thats been anxiously awaiting their Mormon missionaries.

programme.title: House of the Stone Monkeys
programme.desc: The action proceeds along two tracks and two time frames. We meet the boy, who lives with his mother in a Budapest apartment house, in the summer of 2012. Another boy is spending his vacation with his grandparents in the same building in the summer of 1982. The house unveils its mysterious secret to both of them.

programme.title: Nico the Unicorn
programme.desc: A 12-year-old disabled boy, whose father recently passed away, has his life changed when the pony he rescues gives birth to a unicorn. Can he save the unicorn from the people who want to exploit it?

programme.title: The Lucky Dragon
programme.desc: A young, Chinese dragon punished by the gods to be a mere mortal is cast down to earth. He is forced to make his way in a strange land until the evil forces discover his true identity. Take part in a world full of imagination while following the journey of a mischievous dragon who has been transformed by magic into a little boy and exiled from his home to live among humans. When both good and evil forces learn that a dragon has arrived, they look for him as he is the only one who can find the magical sword—whose owner can rule the universe! Will he find the sword in time before it gets into the wrong hands? Will he ever become a dragon again?

programme.title: One More Time
programme.desc: Lucia is an aging Italian actress and director (beautifully portrayed by Antonionis and Fellinis actress Lucia Bosa), decides to come back to the small town where she had spent her happy childhood. She wants to bring the TV where television has never been seen before. She reaches out to the women in the local community with a project that might change their lives forever.

programme.title: Max Cloud
programme.desc: A space cruiser crash lands on the purple planet of Heinous, an intergalactic prison that is home to the most vile and dangerous villains in the galaxy. All of the crew have perished except for its pilot; intergalactic space hero Max Cloud, the ships hapless chef Jake, and its reluctant Commander, Rexy. Their mission is simple, wait inside their vessel until help arrives and try their best to keep the prisoners outside from getting in, however this is Max Cloud and he doesnt do simple. ...But this is not real life. This is a video-game, and at the helm of the adventure is Sarah, a teenage video game fanatic who immerses herself in fantasy to avoid dealing with her less than packed social life and a strained relationship with her dad, straight laced single parent Tony. After a fallout, Tony bans Sarah from playing games and in a frenzy of teenage emotion Sarah makes a wish, that in the blink of an eye becomes a reality... With a flash of pixelated light Sarah is transported into the video game by the mysterious Space Witch, who exists in an etherial void, behind a secret door, that never appears in the same place twice! So Sarah finds herself trapped inside the game and the only person who can help her is her equally socially defunct but incredibly charming friend, Cowboy, who must control Sarah from her bedroom in Brooklyn and keep her from losing her one life, in a game that cant be paused, that they have never finished before! To make matters worse Sarah has not found herself inside the body of the wonderful Max Cloud, but Jake, thats right... the hapless chef. We follow Sarah as she negotiates the terrifying and dangerous planet of Heinous alongside the ever confident Max and fed up Rexy, jumping back and forth with the real world as the pressure mounts on Cowboy and the real stakes start to rise. They soon encounter stranded Bounty Hunter, Brock Donnelly, and realise they must get off the planet before help arrives as the planets surface burns so hot every day that anything not underground is space liquid! AND to add to the stakes Cowboy must keep his best friend away from the evil clutches of the games villain Revengor, a part man, part machine, lunatic who is hell bent on taking Max Clouds ship and with an army of prisoners and an evil sorcersss called SHEE, his chances look pretty damn good. The action bounces between the video game and the real world as Cowboy and Sarah must come together to get her home, all leading to the ultimate showdown in Revengors lair, where back in Brooklyn, video game expertise arrives in the form of a very unlikely hero. Sit down. Plug in. Its time to play THE INTERGALACTIC ADVENTURES OF MAX CLOUD.

programme.title: 10 Things We Should Do Before We Break Up
programme.desc: Abigail, a self-sufficient single mom meets Ben. They both think every great relationship ends in disaster. On the first date they come up with 10 things to do together before they break up. But the estimated end is not so sure - because fate adds #11 to their list.

programme.title: Corner Office
programme.desc: As Orson, The Authoritys newest employee, finds himself trapped in the absurdities of corporate life, his alienation deepens when he discovers a room hes told doesnt exist.

programme.title: The Zodiac
programme.desc: THE ZODIAC takes a different look at the famous Zodiac Killer case from other screen treatments of the murders. More than a simple crime story, the film is an emotional thriller focusing on the murders impact on victims, their families and the wider community. The film follows a police detective and his son who become obsessed with the murders and endanger their family in the process.

programme.title: The Cooler
programme.desc: In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss consternation.

programme.title: Black Water
programme.desc: A deep cover operative awakens to find himself imprisoned in a CIA black site on a submarine.

programme.title: Deserter
programme.desc: Unlikely friends in a melting pot of confusion. Simon Murray fights for the French Foreign Legion. Pascal Dupont fights for himself. War torn men question honour, hope, morality...because you can desert everything...except yourself.

programme.title: Its a Perfect Night for Suicide
programme.desc: A comedy about a psychic who pretends to believe that magic exists, a gigolo who pretends to believe the psychic, an illusionist who pretends to be somebody else and a desperate woman who believes she will find true happiness in love... when shes dead. Lenka is a psychic who besides telling fortunes is great at depriving her clients of them, with the help of an extraordinary uncle-illusionist. The business flourishes until Lenkas most profitable client, a soulful Buddhist Yvonne, decides to commit suicide. She was jilted by the man of her dreams - Oscar. Whats more, Yvonne wants to leave a suicidal note, pointing to Lenka as the cause of all her misfortunes. Lenkas entire world falls apart. She must dissuade Yvonne from killing herself and in her desperation is ready to use all her magical skills to make Oscar fall in love with Yvonne. However, Lenka doesnt even suspect shes entering the lions den. A dangerous game begins. The full moon is on the rise - and, surprisingly, the magic starts to work for real. It turns out that the scenario written in the stars is not an easy thing to change...

programme.title: Summer Dreams
programme.desc: Seventeen-year old Robbie Zirpollo has a problem. As the film opens, his mother is driving him to his new summer job. We learn that Robbie has grown up in Oceanside, California, but now he and his mother have moved to Colorado for a fresh start, as his father has taken the familys savings and his secretary to Mexico. Robbies mom has, through an uncle, gotten him a summer job at Water World on the grounds crew. The adventure begins when Robbie meets Alex and gets moved to Aokees Surf and Snack shack to work. Alex convinces Robbie to enter the parks "Employee Olympics" to bring the Surfer King trophy to its rightful place among the concessions crew. Tiffany, the park owners daughter, has other ideas for Robbie.

programme.title: Raspberry Magic
programme.desc: "Raspberry Magic" is a coming-of-age story about 11-year-old Monica Shah, who thinks she must win the science fair in order to bring her father back after he runs out on the family. She blames herself for her parents problems, and takes charge when her mother falls into a deep depression. Set behind the backdrop of a beautiful forest, Monicas experiment uses touch therapy to help raspberries grow faster. She asks, is it nature or nurture that can truly help a being grow? Does it even matter? Through her ups and downs with her family, she learns that its a complex question, and the answer isnt so simple.

programme.title: Operācija "Fortūna": Māksla uzvarēt

programme.title: Acis plaši aizvērtas
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad Dr. Bila Hartforda sieva Alise atzīstas seksuālās fantāzijās par kādu satiktu vīrieti, Bils kļūst apsēsts ar seksuālu kontaktu. Viņš atklāj pagrīdes grupu, apmeklē vienu no viņu sanāksmēm un ātri vien saprot, ko pārdzīvo.

programme.title: Saikne
programme.desc: Stāsts par seržantu Kinliju, kurš savā pēdējā norīkojumā Afganistānā nonāk komandā ar vietējo tulku Ahmedu. Kad viņu vienību patruļas laikā aplenc, Kinlijs un Ahmeds ir vienīgie izdzīvojušie, un Ahmeds riskē ar dzīvību, nogādājot ievainoto Kinliju drošībā.

programme.title: Grāmatnīca
programme.desc: Anglija, 1959. gads. Nelielā, konservatīvā Anglijas piekrastes pilsētiņā brīdvomātāja Florensa ir nolēmusi atvērt grāmatu veikaliņu. Modinot sabiedrību ar jaunāko grāmatu tirdzniecību, starp kurām ir arī Vladimira Nabokova "Lolita", viņai nākas sastapties gan ar pretestību no vietējās sabiedrības, gan atbalstu no īsteniem grāmatu mīlētājiem.

programme.title: Bens ir atgriezies
programme.desc: Deviņpadsmitgadīgais Bens Bērnss aizbēg no rehabilitācijas centra un negaidīti atgriežas mājās tieši uz Ziemassvētkiem. Bena māte Holija priecājas satikt dēlu, taču raizējas, vai viņš neatsāks lietot narkotikas. Turpmāko 24 stundu laikā gaismā nāk dažādi noslēpumi, un māte dara visu, lai pasargātu dēlu no lielām briesmām.

programme.title: Viņš un viņa
programme.desc: Sāra un Viktors ir kopā vairāk nekā 45 gadus. Kā viņi to izdarīja? Kas īsti ir Sāra, šī mīklainā sieviete, kura vienmēr ir bijusi sava vīra ēnā? Mīlestība, ambīcijas un noslēpumi veicina šī neparastā pāra odiseju.

programme.title: Kolete
programme.desc: Apprecoties ar populāro rakstnieku Villiju, Sidonija Gabriele Kolete no Francijas laukiem nonāk 19. un 20. gadsimta mijas Parīzes intelektuāļu vidē. Vīra pierunāta, Kolete kļūst par viņa rēgu rakstnieci un uzraksta daļēji autobiogrāfisku romānu par dumpīgu lauku meiteni vārdā Klodīne. Romāns gūst lielus panākumus, un Kolete saraksta vairākus tā turpinājumus. Koletes cīņa par radošajām īpašumtiesībām met izaicinājumu sabiedrības priekšstatiem par literatūru, dzimumu lomām, modi un seksualitāti.

programme.title: Lepnums un aizspriedumi
programme.desc: Kad Elizabete Beneta satiek izskatīgo misteru Dārsiju, viņa domā, ka viņš ir pēdējais vīrietis, ar kuru viņa jebkad varētu apprecēties.. Bet - abu dzīvēm savijoties, viņu tomēr savaldzina vīrietis, kuru viņa ir zvērējusi ienīst mūžīgi.

programme.title: Pianists

programme.title: Last Bite Hotel
programme.desc: Tituss Burgess puts eight chefs to work making a welcome bite for guest Marcus Samuelsson. Next, the chefs are divided into teams for a new task.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: Michael Symon and Esther Choi ask the 11 remaining chefs to create a three-course meal worthy of a black-tie event in 60 minutes.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Super Mega Cakes
programme.desc: Duff Goldmans battle continues against Lincoln Alexanders team as they create cakes inspired by cartoons that feature gravity-defying effects.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 2. Cooking show.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 3. Cooking show.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Rachel Khoos Simple Pleasures
programme.desc: Cooking doesnt have to be difficult, nor does it require extravagant ingredients that are hard to find. From her home kitchen in Sweden, Rachel Khoo shares her secrets to cooking, providing viewers with delectable recipes created from easy-to-source ingredients, and guaranteeing enjoyment when it comes to rustling up dinner. Though her recipes are laced with simplicity, they are packed with flavour and she encourages viewers to recreate these mouthwatering fares.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Asian-Inspired Food. Joanna welcomes special guest Emma Lovewell into the kitchen to make traditional Asian dishes, including Japchae, yaki gyoza and egg drop soup.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Jos Faves. Joanna shares her all-time favourite recipes, including Chicken Cordon Bleu, Gruyere Potato Casserole, and Arugula and Dried Cherry Salad.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Mexican Cuisine. Joanna shares her recipes for spinach enchiladas with a side of Mexican rice and charro beans, queso blanco, fresh tomato salsa and churro cookies.

programme.title: Cupcake Championship
programme.desc: Four cupcake connoisseurs battle it out in this cooking competition series, hoping to prove they are the supreme cupcake bakers and take home the $10,000 prize. Each of these contestants are undoubtedly talented cupcake designers, but there can only be one winner, and the heat is on to showcase their artistry and flair when it comes to baking these little sweet treats. Hosted by Kardea Brown, the show give the bakers new challenges to complete in each episode, with the poorest performing contestant eliminated at each stage of the competition, resulting in a final showdown between the very best.

programme.title: Last Bite Hotel
programme.desc: Tituss Burgess puts eight chefs to work making a welcome bite for guest Marcus Samuelsson. Next, the chefs are divided into teams for a new task.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods

The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Outrageous Pumpkins
programme.desc: Pumpkin carving is one of the most fun activities during autumn season. But these individuals take it to the next level, creating real works of art out of their pumpkins. Watch them compete in a series of fun challenges for a great cash prize. They transform the pumpkins into various spooky things, from monsters to zombies and more.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Strawberry Pie In The Sky. Strawberries steal the show when Michael Symon makes spatchcock chicken and strawberry salad. Plus, Liz puts together a fresh strawberry pie.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: NOLA Beignet Dream. Michael Symon answers The Big Easys call with some New Orleans-style gumbo and chocolatey beignets. Liz sweetens the deal with a Sazerac.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.desc: Новости: a news report from Ukraine with details of the latest national and international stories.

programme.title: Ielu karaļi
programme.desc: Losandželosas policijas departamenta veterāns Toms Ladlovs (Keanu Rīvss) ir pieredzējis ļaunāko, kas redzams uz ielām. Kad viņa pārinieks iet bojā, viņš ielu vardarbību sāk uztvert personiski. Ladlovam uzdod saukt sava pārinieka slepkavu pie atbildības, taču policijas kapteinis (Forests Vitakers) ir noraizējies, ka karstgalvīgais izmeklētājs ir pārāk personiski iesaistīts lietā. Ladlovs nolīgst jauno slepkavību nodaļas izmeklētāju Diskantu, lai sadzītu pēdas viņa pārinieka slepkavām Losandželosas ielās.

programme.title: Stabilizators
programme.desc: Izbijušais ASV specvienības kareivis Makkals ir inscenējis savu nāvi, lai dzīves atlikušo daļu pavadītu mierā, dzīvojot klusu dzīvi Bostonā. Tomēr no šī plāna nākas atteikties, kad viņš satiek jaunu meiteni Teriju, kura nonākusi nežēlīgas un vardarbīgas krievu mafijas rokās - tādā situācijā Makkals nespēj vienkārši noskatīties. Skaidrs, ka viņam meitene jāglābj, un nākas atkal ķerties pie ieročiem un darīt to, ko viņš prot vislabāk.

programme.title: Bastīlijas diena
programme.desc: Straujajā un spraigajā trillerī Bastīlijas diena būs spiesti sadarboties divi pavisam dažādu jomu profesionāļi. Viens no viņiem ir CIP slepenais aģents, pieredzējis tik daudz, ka ar to pietiktu krietnam simtam parastu mirstīgo, otrs – nevainojami savu amatu apguvis kabatzaglis. No viņu sekmīgas sadarbības atkarīga speciālo dienestu aģenta turpmākā karjera, zagļa brīvība, miers visā Parīzē un pat stabilitāte pasaulē.

programme.title: Slepkavas kodekss
programme.desc: Kad Anna bija bērns, viņu no nāves izglāba leģendārais slepkava Mūdijs. Apguvusi sava glābēja arodu, Anna ir kļuvusi par vienu no prasmīgākajām pasūtījuma slepkavām pasaulē. Kad Mūdijs tiek nogalināts, viņa nozvēras atriebties un nogalināt to, kurš atņēmis dzīvību cilvēkam, kurš viņai iemācījis visu.

programme.title: Iepazīstieties, spartieši
programme.desc: Viņu vairs nav 300, bet, neskatoties uz to, varonīgais spartiešu karalis Leonīds ir pieņēmis persiešu izaicinājumu un ved kaujā salašņu grupu, kurā ir 13 spartieši. Sacenšoties dažādās realitāšu šovu disciplīnās ar neparedzamajiem persiešiem un viņu pavēlnieku Kserksu, kurš izskatās aizdomīgi līdzīgs Borata producentam Azmatam Bagatovam, Leonīds pat vēl nenojauš par slēptajām persiešu rezervēm.

programme.title: Mārlijs un es
programme.desc: Džons īsti nevēlas bērnus, tāpēc draugs ierosina viņam iegādāties kucēnu. Tā šķiet lieliska ideja, un Džons ļauj draudzenei Dženijai izvēlēties viņu jauno četrkājaino draugu. Labradoram Mārlijam ienākot ģimenē, sakas īsta jautrība un piedzīvojumi, jo apburošais kucēns izraisa īstu haosu un nekārtību. Drīz vien pārim piesakās arī pirmais mazulis, un pēc tam – vēl viens. Ģimenes mīlulis un palaidnis Mārlijs nav prognozējams, taču ienes ģimenē daudz prieka un pozitīvu emociju.

programme.title: 200 % vilks
programme.desc: Kad Freda Lupina vēlēšanās piepildās ne tā, kā viņš to paredzējis, vilciņš pārvēršas par vilkati un uz Zemes nonāk palaidnīgs Mēness gariņš. Nu Fredijam jādara viss, lai atjaunotu kosmisko kārtību, pirms Zeme sadursies ar Mēnesi.

programme.title: Marija
programme.desc: Marija Kallasa, pasaulē izcilākā operdziedātāja, pavada savas dzīves pēdējās dienas 1970. gadu Parīzē, saskaroties ar savu identitāti.

programme.title: Bitīte Maija: Medus spēles
programme.desc: Bitīte Maija ir patīkami satraukta, jo tuvojas slavenās Medus spēles. Varbūt beidzot spiets tiks izraudzīts dalībai? Taču bitītes satraukums izgaist, kad viņa uzzina, ka strops nepiedalīsies spēlēs, turklāt puse ražas būs jāatdod spēļu dalībniekiem. Maijai tas šķiet netaisnīgi. Bez stropa karalienes atļaujas viņa grasās lidot uz Zumtropoli pie imperatores un lūgt atļauju stropam piedalīties spēlēs.

programme.title: Trakās ķepas. Leģenda par Henku
programme.desc: Henks varbūt ir necils suns, taču viņš ir apņēmības pilns kļūt par samuraju. Suņuks dodas uz valsti, kur čum un mudž no kaķiem. Tur Henks satiek nejauko kaķu karavadoni Iku Ču un arī Džimbo, kurš reiz bijis varens samurajs. Džimbo paņem Henku savā paspārnē un iemāca viņam, ko īsti nozīmē būt samurajam. Dzimstot pirmajai īstajai draudzībai starp kaķi un suni, abiem nākas glābt Kakamučo no ļaunā Ika Ču.

programme.title: Atmiņas par nākotni
programme.desc: 1914. gadā, laužot pieņēmumus par sievieti tā laika sabiedrībā, Vera Britena kļūst par Somervilas koledžas studenti Oksfordā. Sākoties Pirmajam pasaules karam, viņas brālis Edvards, līgavainis Rolands Leitons un draugi Viktors un Džefrijs tiek nosūtīti cīnīties frontes priekšējās līnijās. Arī Vera ziedojas un atstāj koledžu, lai dotos līdzi un pievienotos brīvprātīgo mediķu organizācijai, rūpējoties par ievainotajiem un mirstošajiem kareivjiem Londonā, Maltā un Francijā.

programme.title: Pie visa vainīga mīlestība
programme.desc: Žoslēns ir veiksmīgs biznesmenis, toties mīlas dzīvē – patmīlīgs brunču mednieks. Kad viņš mēģina jau atkal savaldzināt jaunu sievieti, izliekoties, ka ir ratiņkrēslā, viņa iepazīstina Žoslēnu ar savu māsu, kura patiešām piesaistīta dzīvei ratiņkrēslā.

programme.title: Klātbūtne
programme.desc: Ģimene ir pārliecināta, ka jaunajā piepilsētas mājā viņi nav vieni.

programme.title: Gaismas impērija
programme.desc: Iespaidīgs un aizkustinošs stāsts par cilvēciskajām attiecībām, kino burvību, izcilu angļu dzeju un 80. gadu populāro mūziku. Ar šizofrēniju sirgstošā Hilarija (Olīvija Kolmana) strādā pilsētiņas kinoteātrī un ir spiesta samierināties ar sava priekšnieka Elisa kunga (Kolina Fērta) aizskarošo uzvedību. Visi par to zina, taču neviens neiejaucas. Tomēr viss mainās, kad darbā tiek pieņemts jaunais Stīvens. Neskatoties uz vecuma starpību, abi iemīlas.

programme.title: Elizeja
programme.desc: 2154. gadā pastāv tikai divas cilvēku šķiras: ļoti bagātie, kuri dzīvo uz drošas kosmosa stacijas, sauktas par Elizeju. Un pārējie, kuri mitinās uz pārapdzīvotās un daļēji nopostītās Zemes. Planētas iedzīvotāji vairs nav spējīgi cīnīties pret noziedzību un trūkumu, kas apņēmis zemi. Ir tikai viens cilvēks, kuram rodas iespēja vienādot šo divu pasauļu dzīvi, un viņu sauc Makss - vienkāršs puisis, kuram par katru cenu jānokļūst Elizejā. Kamēr viņa dzīvība karājas mata gala, viņš uzņemas bīstamu misiju, stājoties pretī Elizejas varenajiem. Ja viņam paveiksies, viņš izglābs ne tikai savu dzīvību, bet arī miljoniem cilvēku, kuri mitinās uz Zemes.

programme.title: Īlaijas grāmata
programme.desc: Pa postapokaliptisko zemi, kas reiz bija Amerika, ceļo kāds vīrs. Caur tukšām pilsētām, izpostītām autostrādēm - pa zemi, kas pārvērtusies pelnos. Šeit nav civilizācijas un nekādu likumu. Ceļi pieder bandām, kas nogalinās cilvēku par pāri kurpju vai malku ūdens. Taču sacensties ar vientuļnieku nav pa spēkam nevienam - Īlaija pieveiks ikvienu, kas to izaicinās. Tomēr viņš necīnās par savu labklājību, viņam ir misija, ko viņš apņēmies veikt līdz galam.

programme.title: Dzīve gada laikā
programme.desc: Kad 17 gadus vecais Darils uzzina, ka viņa draudzene drīzumā varētu nomirt, viņš nolemj viņai sniegt viņas dzīves labāko pieredzi, piedāvājot pilnībā izbaudīt atlikušo gadu, kas viņai palicis šajā saulē.

programme.title: Spoku mednieki
programme.desc: Astoņdesmito gadu kulta filma atgūst otro elpu pēc 30 gadiem! Reiz spoku mednieki izglāba Ņujorku no spoku uzbrukuma, taču, kad pilsētai atkal draud briesmas, pagātnes varoņi vairs nav spējīgi stāties aizsardzībā. Laiks viņu vietu ieņemt citiem brašuļiem... vai tomēr brašulēm? Spoku mednieku jaunais četrinieks ir gatavs upurēt sevi, aizsargājot dzimto megapoli no visādiem mošķiem!

programme.title: 10 dzīvības
programme.desc: Lutināts kaķis Bekets par pašsaprotamu uzskata laimīgo lozi, kas viņam iedalīta, kopš viņu izglāba un iemīlēja Roza, labsirdīga un aizrautīga studente. Kad kaķis zaudē savu devīto dzīvību, liktenis iejaucas, lai viņu aizvestu pārmācošā piedzīvojumā.

programme.title: Amerikas maģisko melnādaino biedrība
programme.desc: Jauns vīrietis tiek uzņemts noslēpumainā biedrībā, kurā darbojas maģiski melnādainie cilvēki, kas veltī savu dzīvi augstākā mērķa īstenošanai: atvieglot baltajiem cilvēkiem dzīvi.

programme.title: Vīrs, vārdā Oto
programme.desc: Stāsts par nīgru atraitni, vārdā Oto Andersons, kura vienīgais prieciņš ir ķīvēšanās ar izmisušajiem kaimiņiem un viņu kritizēšana. Kad viņam blakus durvīs ievācas kāda jauna ģimene, asprātīgajā grūtniecē Marisolā viņš sastopas ar līdzvērtīgu pretinieku. Šī satikšanās izvēršas par negaidītu draudzību, kas apvērsīs Oto pasauli kājām gaisā.

programme.title: Singstrīta
programme.desc: Dublina, 1985. gads. Ekonomiskā krīze Īrijā arvien vairāk cilvēku iedzen bankrotā, tikmēr 15 gadus vecais Konors kopā ar brāli un māsu dzīvo pie vecākiem, kuru laulībai draud izjukšana. Lai ietaupītu naudu, Konoram nākas mainīt skolu. Tur viņš ātri vien kļūst par izstumto. Kādu dienu viņš pamana Rafīnu, kura šad tad stāv iepretim skolai, raudzīdamās tālumā un smēķēdama vienu cigareti pēc otras. Viņa ir skaista, divus gadus vecāka par Konoru, viņai ir draugs, un viņa strādā par modeli. Īsāk sakot: viņa ir gandrīz nesasniedzama. Taču Konors nav gatavs padoties un piedāvā meitenei piedalīties viņa grupas videoklipā. Rafīna piekrīt, un Konors ir panikā, jo grupas viņam nemaz nav...

programme.title: Maskētie spiegi
programme.desc: Superspiegs Lenss Sterlings ir labākais savā profesijā un, būdams dzīvesprieka pilns, viņš ar lielāko prieku katru dienu glābj pilsētas un valstis. Jaunais zinātnieks Volters, kurš apgādā Lensu ar modernām ierīcēm, ir pilnīgs pretstats - būdams vienmēr drūms, viņš cenšas būt nošķirts no visas pasaules un palikt vienatnē ar saviem izgudrojumiem. Taču pienāk brīdis, kad neparastajam pārītim būs jāatrod kopīga valoda, lai ar neticamu brīnumu palīdzību izglābtu pasauli.

programme.title: Bada garša
programme.desc: Kāds pāris ziedo visu, tikai lai saņemtu visaugstāko atzinību pavārmākslas pasaulē — Michelin zvaigzni.

programme.title: Kucēni un mīlestība
programme.desc: Pēc katastrofāla pirmā randiņa Nikola un Makss zvēr, ka nekad vairs nesazināsies. Taču viss mainās, kad viņi uzzina, ka abu suņi pa īso tikšanās laiku ir paguvuši atrast mīlestību - un nu gaidāmi kucēni! Lai gan Nikola un Makss ir tik ļoti atšķirīgi, viņi nolemj būt atbildīgi suņu "vecāki". Kopā rūpējoties par kucēniem, abi pamazām satuvinās.

programme.title: Māceklis
programme.desc: Stāsts par meistaru un viņa mācekli Ņujorkas nekustamo īpašumu džungļos. 70. gadu sākumā Donalds Tramps ir iesācējs – kompleksu mākts lietu kārtotājs, kurš atrodas tētuka Trampa seniora pavēnī. Iepazīstoties ar advokātu Roju Konu, viņa dzīve mainās. Zogot no citiem idejas, spārnotus teicienus (arī no Reigana) un pārņemot Kona taktiku, Tramps kļūst par savu "labāko versiju". AIDS epidēmija, šovbiznesa ziedonis un itāļu marmora modernās pilis. Pilsēta, kas nekad neguļ, ir Trampa spēļu laukums – tiesa, tajā viņam pašam kļūst par šauru.

programme.title: Argentīna,
programme.desc: Sacenšoties ar laiku, 80. gados juristu komanda neticamā cīņā cenšas atmaskot Argentīnas asiņainās militārās diktatūras vadītājus.

programme.title: Algoritms
programme.desc: Lilija Čana, kuru atveido aktrise Sonoja Mizuno, ir datorinženiere Silīcija ielejas tehnoloģiju uzņēmumā "Amaija". Viņas draugam, Karla Glusmana spēlētājam varonim Sergejam, kas arī strādā šajā uzņēmumā par kiberdrošības speciālistu, piedāvā iespēju piedalīties jaunā kvanta skaitļošanas projektā "Devs". Projektu vada "Amaijas" noslēpumainais izpilddirektors Forests, kas neko daudz negrib izpaust. Neilgi pēc iesaistīšanās projektā Sergejs pazūd. Lilija ir pārliecināta, ka tas saistāms ar jaunajiem darba pienākumiem. Ar bijušā drauga Džeimija palīdzību viņa sāk šķetināt iespējamos pazušanas iemeslus, bet vienu versiju nomaina cita, un lieta kļūst aizvien mistiskāka.

programme.title: Dusmīgie putni. Filma
programme.desc: Reiz uz kādas paradīzes salas dzīvoja putni, kas nemācēja lidot. Tāpēc viņi visi bija labi, miermīlīgi un laimīgi... Precīzāk, gandrīz visi. Uz pārējo salas iemītnieku fona depresīvais Reds, trauksmainais Čaks un neveiklais Bumba izcēlās ar savu neparedzamo uzvedību un skaitījās izstumtie. Taču, kad salā pēkšņi parādījās noslēpumainās zaļās cūkas, kam noteikti aiz ādas bija kāda cūcība, tieši Reds, Čaks un Bumba stājās viņiem pretī!

programme.title: Dinozauriņš Diplodoks
programme.desc: Titulētais dinozauriņš dodas piedzīvojumā, lai glābtu savus vecākus, kuri pazuduši mīklainos apstākļos. Ceļā viņš sastaps ne vien burvi un divus dīvainus zinātniekus, bet arī fantastiskas būtnes un nokļūs apbrīnojamās vietās.

programme.title: Minioni
programme.desc: Minjoni, kas attīstījās no dzelteniem vienšūnas organismiem, dzīvo uz Zemes kopš aizvēsturiskiem laikiem. Viņu dzīves jēga ir kalpošana, taču mazie radījumi nemitīgi atrod sev nekam nederīgus saimniekus, sākot no dinozaura un beidzot ar Napoleonu. Ja minjoniem nav saimnieka, kuram zemoties, viņi ieslīgst dziļā depresijā. Taču minjonam Kevinam ir plāns – kopā ar draugiem Stjuartu un Bobu viņš dodas meklēt jaunu ļauno saimnieku, kuram sekot. Tā viņi atrod Skārletu Nomušītu, kas ir pasaulē pirmā superļaundare.

programme.title: Palaidnīgā feja
programme.desc: 337 gadus jaunajai zobu fejai Violetai maģija nešķiet īpaši aizraujoša, tāpēc viņa vienīgā nespēj nokārtot eksāmenu, lai iegūtu kristālu, kas fejām ļauj iekļūt cilvēku pasaulē. Violeta neļauj skumjām vaļu, nozog kristālu citai fejai un nokļūst 12 gadus vecās bārenītes Maksijas istabā. Tomēr, ak vai! Kristāls saplīst, un nu Violeta ir iesprostota cilvēku pasaulē! Kopā ar Maksiju viņa meklē atpakaļceļu un atklāj savu patieso aicinājumu.

programme.title: EuroLeague. Maccabi Tel Aviv - Paris Basketball
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. Real Madrid - Olympiacos
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. programme.title: Futbols: Serie A. Žurnāls Full Impact. 5. raidījums
Serie A. Lazio - Torino
programme.desc: Coverage of Italys top-flight football league.

programme.title: ERC Rallijs. Horvātija. 4. ātrumposms
programme.desc: The event takes place on asphalt roads around Zagreb and other regions of the country, standing out with its demanding stages characterized by variable conditions — from wet and slippery surfaces to numerous technical corners.

programme.title: ERC Rallijs. Horvātija. 5. ātrumposms
programme.desc: The event takes place on asphalt roads around Zagreb and other regions of the country, standing out with its demanding stages characterized by variable conditions — from wet and slippery surfaces to numerous technical corners.

programme.title: LaLiga. Real Madrid - Villarreal
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: UFC 320: Magomed Ankalaev vs Alex Pereira
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. Maccabi - Paris
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous: Welcome Inn
programme.desc: Follow married couple Dave and Jenny Marrs as they undertake a challenging renovation project, transforming a 19th century historic home into a bed and breakfast. As soon as they saw the property in Bentonville, Arkansas the idea was born. The financial stakes are high, as the place has been abandoned for a long time, but Dave and Jenny are determined to turn it into an inn of their dreams. Join as we follow their journey every step of the way in detail, as they face various issues, from construction to bee infestation and a lot more.

programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Rehab Addict is a TV show documenting home renovations, hosted by a charming designer Nicole Curtis. Nicole is a strong supporter of the idea of preservation and restoration of existing architecture when possible instead of its destruction. Her philosophy is to "restore old homes to their former glory" rather than modernization. She has revived historic homes in Michigan, Ohio and Minnesota and saved them from the wrecking ball. Nicole deals with the government bureaucrats, creates a team and together they go above and beyond to bring back former glory to the old buildings. Nicole is a bundle of energy and a perfect source of motivation and inspiration.

Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home

Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Flip or Flop

It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. programme.title: Bargain Block
programme.desc: Bargain Block follows home renovation experts and partners Keith Bynum and Evan Thomas on their journey to restore Detroits iconic American neighborhoods one house at a time. With sound advice and support from their friend—lifetime Detroit resident and real estate expert Shea Hicks-Whitfield, who is expecting her first child—Keith and Evan buy multiple rundown and abandoned houses on a single block, take them down to the studs, and create affordable, stylish and fully furnished starter homes that are ideal for first-time homebuyers. Now settled in the Motor City, the couple, who have renovated and purchased their own home and opened a new retail store and workshop, infuse every property with a functional layout, artful design and beautiful repurposed furniture. The end result is incredible transformations of dilapidated homes that are an inspiration to the entire neighborhood.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: In this home improvement show, watch Ben and Erin Napier renovate old dulling houses in Mississippi, USA to dream homes. The pair are hoping to share their love of the small, historic homes of the town, and also transfer the enthusiasm of renovating a place to other home buyers. But can issues arise with the home replenishments. Since all the houses are extremely old, Ben and Erin do face problems ensuring the house dont get damaged when they work on them, and also that they can keep up with their original up to scratch plans. All the meanwhile they both ensure the homes are renovated at a low budgeted rate. Are they able to create beautiful homes for the people of Mississippi without damaging the infrastructure of the house too much? This fun-loving reality series has been running since 2016.

programme.title: Bahamas Life

In each episode of Bahamas Life, we detail the processes involved, the choice of islands and the remarkable real estate opportunities for prospective buyers looking to fulfill their dreams.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: In this episode, Corey, Chum, and Rick are back in Vegas and unpacking all the treasures they found on the road and revealing some never-before-seen items. From belt buckles in Texas, to sleek yachts in Seattle, and 18th century pistols.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum explore the Wolverines lair, facing mishaps with a Thunderbird, winning a "Star Wars" collection with the force, and snagging a signed jersey from football legend LaMarr Woodley, who later surprises them.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are hoping to strike it rich in the Mill City, Minneapolis, Minnesota. While there, the guys have a brush with a happy little Bob Ross painting, tackle a jersey signed by the Minnesota Vikings Purple People Eaters.

programme.desc: Could a prehistoric-looking creature washed ashore in Georgia be something new to local scientists? Is a death-defying experience for a toddler proof of guardian angels? And did a UFO spotted in Canada burn up in the atmosphere?

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: American Pickers is an American reality series that follows ingenious "pickers" Mike Wolfe, and his business partner, Frank Fritz, as they hunt down objects with historical, collectible and pop culture value. They travel around the United States to buy or "pick" various items for resale, for clients, or for their own personal collections. Danielle Colby is in charge of their office of Antique Archaeology.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Andy and Paul team up with the investigator of Skinwalker Ranch to probe an abandoned New Mexico ranch whose owner claims is infested with malevolent demons; their attempts at communication with this phenomenon opens up a chilling "conversation."

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Is a photograph of a UFO hovering over Holloman Air Force Base in New Mexico confirmation that President Eisenhower had a Top-Secret meeting with aliens there? What is the origin of frightening howls recorded in Witset, British Columbia?

programme.title: The UnXplained: Mysteries of the Universe
programme.desc: Humanity has worshipped the Sun since the beginning of time, and yet even with our modern technology, we still know so little about it. Could unlocking the mysteries of the Sun be the difference between life and death for human civilization?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: In this episode, Corey, Chum, and Rick are back in Vegas and unpacking all the treasures they found on the road and revealing some never-before-seen items. From belt buckles in Texas, to sleek yachts in Seattle, and 18th century pistols.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Are reports of a strange swirling vortex with a brilliant white center in the skies over Oklahoma proof of a genuine UFO? Does a video claimed to be discovered sealed in Vatican archives, show a real case of demonic possession?

programme.title: Great Escapes with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: The Academy Award-winning actor explores the stories of some of the most famous jailbreaks in history, from notorious places like Alcatraz, Dannemora and Pittsburgh State Penitentiary. Freeman, who once played the character of prisoner Red in the legendary Shawshank Redemption, investigates these incredible real-life escapes using cutting-edge technology to recreate them. Join him to discover the untold stories behind these daring jailbreaks, through firsthand accounts from prisoners, their cellmates, families and prison employees.

programme.title: Engineering an Empire
programme.desc: Documentary series, hosted by Peter Weller, an actor and a professor at Syracuse University, that explores the engineering and architectural achievements that were characteristic of some of the greatest civilizations on this planet - Rome, Egypt, Greece, the Aztecs, the Maya, Russia, China, the Persians, the Byzantines, Britain, France, and Italy in the late 15th and 16th centuries. Using interviews with experts, re-enactments, and computer-generated graphics, this programme looks at various structures, buildings and mechanical inventions, from Menes dam built in around 3000 BC in Egypt to the worlds first locomotive invented in Britain.

programme.title: Lost Gold of WW2
programme.desc: Its said to be the greatest lost treasure from World War II and, in this documentary series, a team of engineers, scientists and investigators attempt to finally locate the loot of General Tomoyuki Yamashita. As the war was drawing to a close, General Yamashita is rumoured to have buried a stolen loot made up of worth hundreds of billions of dollars in Southeast Asia. With the world in a state of disarray and confusion, the loot has been left to sink into the shadows, until now. The team hope to unearth its location using groundbreaking technology, studying three different locations in the Philippines that could hold valuable answers.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: The Jersey Devil, a winged half-bird half-horse, haunts New Jersey. Its screams echo through the Pine Barrens, causing panic. MonsterQuests expedition and detective investigations seek scientific evidence to unravel the truth behind this legend.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: Historical documentary series that visits a range of diverse modern cities including Istanbul, New York, Rome, London, Cairo, and Sydney. By travelling underneath the streets and roads we use today, we learn about the fascinating pasts and ancient secrets of these incredible places.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. programme.title: Breaking Mysterious
programme.desc: Join host Jimmy Church and his team of truth-seeking investigators as they examine some of the biggest mysteries, extraordinary phenomena and unconventional conspiracy theories in America. Episodes include investigating a plot to assassinate President John F. Kennedy just weeks before his actual, tragic assassination in Dallas with vital new information being obtained from one of the Presidents secret servicemen; debating the possibility that a popular virtual smartphone game could actually be part of a CIA mind control operation; or tracking the events when a nuclear weapon goes missing off the coast of Georgias Tybee Island. Follow the team as they seek disclosure, answers and the truth in this adventurous series.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: Discovering the final resting place of Cleopatra is a lifelong passion for many an archaeologist. Now Zahi has permitted some to dive into the Mediterranean Sea and bring up a nine-ton pylon that is a confirmed part of her shrine.

programme.title: Engineering an Empire

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: Historical documentary series that visits a range of diverse modern cities including Istanbul, New York, Rome, London, Cairo, and Sydney. By travelling underneath the streets and roads we use today, we learn about the fascinating pasts and ancient secrets of these incredible places.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Breaking Mysterious
programme.desc: Join host Jimmy Church and his team of truth-seeking investigators as they examine some of the biggest mysteries, extraordinary phenomena and unconventional conspiracy theories in America. Episodes include investigating a plot to assassinate President John F. Kennedy just weeks before his actual, tragic assassination in Dallas with vital new information being obtained from one of the Presidents secret servicemen; debating the possibility that a popular virtual smartphone game could actually be part of a CIA mind control operation; or tracking the events when a nuclear weapon goes missing off the coast of Georgias Tybee Island. Follow the team as they seek disclosure, answers and the truth in this adventurous series.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: Discovering the final resting place of Cleopatra is a lifelong passion for many an archaeologist. Now Zahi has permitted some to dive into the Mediterranean Sea and bring up a nine-ton pylon that is a confirmed part of her shrine.

programme.title: Engineering an Empire
programme.desc: Documentary series, hosted by Peter Weller, an actor and a professor at Syracuse University, that explores the engineering and architectural achievements that were characteristic of some of the greatest civilizations on this planet - Rome, Egypt, Greece, the Aztecs, the Maya, Russia, China, the Persians, the Byzantines, Britain, France, and Italy in the late 15th and 16th centuries. Using interviews with experts, re-enactments, and computer-generated graphics, this programme looks at various structures, buildings and mechanical inventions, from Menes dam built in around 3000 BC in Egypt to the worlds first locomotive invented in Britain.

programme.title: Lost Gold of WW2
programme.desc: Its said to be the greatest lost treasure from World War II and, in this documentary series, a team of engineers, scientists and investigators attempt to finally locate the loot of General Tomoyuki Yamashita. As the war was drawing to a close, General Yamashita is rumoured to have buried a stolen loot made up of worth hundreds of billions of dollars in Southeast Asia. With the world in a state of disarray and confusion, the loot has been left to sink into the shadows, until now. The team hope to unearth its location using groundbreaking technology, studying three different locations in the Philippines that could hold valuable answers.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: The Jersey Devil, a winged half-bird half-horse, haunts New Jersey. Its screams echo through the Pine Barrens, causing panic. MonsterQuests expedition and detective investigations seek scientific evidence to unravel the truth behind this legend.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: Historical documentary series that visits a range of diverse modern cities including Istanbul, New York, Rome, London, Cairo, and Sydney. By travelling underneath the streets and roads we use today, we learn about the fascinating pasts and ancient secrets of these incredible places.
